title: FS: T206 Brown - Chicago on Shirt - PSA 2
author: Cmount76

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Brown - Chicago on Shirt - PSA 2
posts.post_content:
$OLD Delivered assuming a non fee method like PPFF, Venmo, or Zelle.  Please add 3% for GS.

"I'll take it" trumps any ongoing conversations.  Send me a PM to confirm.

If you PM me your email, I can send bigger pictures.

Thanks!

Sometimes I have to post pics both with the “www” ([url]http://www.net54baseball.com[/url]) and without the “www” ([url]http://net54baseball.com[/url]) to get pics to work on all devices and computers.

[quote name="eliotdeutsch" post=2125599]Sometimes I have to post pics both with the “www” ([url]http://www.net54baseball.com[/url]) and without the “www” ([url]http://net54baseball.com[/url]) to get pics to work on all devices and computers.[/QUOTE]

Thanks for the tip.  I tried it using both methods and neither worked.  It's a little bizarre, because I have never had an issue uploading photos and am using the same method I always have.
You might try re-sizing your photo to medium or small that works for me.
A bump for getting the pictures attached...
Let's bump it for a price reduction.

That’s a really nice card for the grade. :)


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Really nice card!! And it's a Factory 25. I'm just bumping your post to the top and commenting on the picture upload issues you were having. I never had any problems and didn't change anything. Then one day my photos stopped showing up in the preview section. But others would see my pictures that I posted, just not me. Kind of odd and never figured out the problem. I had a similar issue when I was running my own web servers. I couldn't view the websites from my browser on the web server but had no problem viewing them from a different computer visiting my web server. I remember fixing the issue by changing a setting on my web servers. But still don't know the fix for my current issue with seeing my pictures. I tried smaller graphics, which was never a problem in the past, and I even tried a different browser. Switching from Internet Explorer to Google Chrome. When I look at my post from my phone, the pictures are viewable. Just not from my computer. I'll have to see what happens if I remove the www from the link.

Ordinarily, I would be interested in this card.  I am doing a back run on brown Chicago. I think however, I have this card in a PSA 4.   I will check when I can. And get back with you.

Very Respectfully 
Zach

PS.  Yes your card is fantastic for the grade. :)


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

PM sent

Thanks for the kind words about the card and great conversations...nothing finalized though....

Bump it up top!

I will still bid $350.00 if that interests you

Very Respectfully,
Zach Lawrence
